title: forge构建失败，缺失文件。
author: 十雨
txt_content:
[main/ERROR] [FML]: The binary patch set is missing. Either you are in a development environment, or things are not going to work!
[08:09:15] [main/ERROR] [FML]: The minecraft jar file:/C:/Users/Admin/.gradle/caches/minecraft/net/minecraftforge/forge/1.7.2-10.12.1.1060/forgeSrc-1.7.2-10.12.1.1060.jar!/net/minecraft/client/ClientBrandRetriever.class appears to be corrupt! There has been CRITICAL TAMPERING WITH MINECRAFT, it is highly unlikely minecraft will work! STOP NOW, get a clean copy and try again!
[08:09:15] [main/ERROR] [FML]: FML has been ordered to ignore the invalid or missing minecraft certificate. This is very likely to cause a problem!
[08:09:15] [main/ERROR] [FML]: Technical information: ClientBrandRetriever was at jar:file:/C:/Users/Admin/.gradle/caches/minecraft/net/minecraftforge/forge/1.7.2-10.12.1.1060/forgeSrc-1.7.2-10.12.1.1060.jar!/net/minecraft/client/ClientBrandRetriever.class, there were 0 certificates for it
[08:09:15] [main/ERROR] [FML]: FML appears to be missing any signature data. This is not a good thing
[08:09:15] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.CoreModManager$FMLPluginWrapper
[08:09:15] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLDeobfTweaker
[08:09:16] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Launching wrapped minecraft {net.minecraft.client.main.Main}
[08:09:17] [main/ERROR] [LaunchWrapper]: Unable to launch复制代码虽然知道了缺失某个东西，但是按照它说的重新构建了几次，都出现这种情况。请问下这种情况有没有别的解决方法？

replies.author: 十雨
replies.txt_content: lz已经忽略此问题，但还是希望得到解决办法！
